Posts.Content: Has anyone heard of new procedures for mamograms that say you do not need compression or very minimual compression to the point where you do not feel anything? I had one a couple months ago and the tech told me she found you gets just as good results with minimal compression istead of causing pain or discomfort. In fact the woman before me said she never felt anything and was not going to come back beecause last years was so uncomfortable.
Posts.Title: Mammogran changes - breast cancer
